attributes.action: We the people of United Kingdom call a motion of no confidence in the government

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Hold a general election in 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571548
